reminded one case particular shows need reform kind case outlined alice jenkins her book law rich she approached her domestic help friend living her husband two young children two rooms tenement medical advice she given she third child learn practise birth control she squalid economic conditions alice jenkins unable anything her give her advice she writes little foresee she actually days later she taken hospital high state delirium died next day soon two detectives visited home find knew case leaving kind enough ask interested attend inquiry several days later coroner's court widower said witness box he known his wife pregnant later pathologist stated he examined deceased died acute septicaemia brought use kitchen utensil pierced wall uterus doctor's voice continued pregnancy effect bringing matter open enabling family doctor consulted believe prevent tragedies kind
